Event.name: Rape
Event.definition:
<def-root>The words in this frame describe situations in which the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> has sexual intercourse with the <fen>Victim</fen> forcibly (or by threatening the use of force) and without his or her consent. <ex></ex> <ex>Does the press make it more difficult for <t>raped</t> <fex name="Victim">women</fex> to obtain justice?</ex>
<ex><fex name="Time">On their third</fex> date <fex name="Perp">he</fex> took her back to his surgery and <t>raped</t> <fex name="Victim">her</fex>.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Perpetrator
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the person who forces another person to have sexual intercourse with him or her against the other person's will.</def-root>

Arg.name: Victim
Arg.definition: <def-root>This is the person who is forced to engage in sexual intercourse against his or her will.</def-root>

Arg.name: Means
Arg.definition: <def-root>An act performed by the <fen>Perpetrator</fen> by which the sexual crime is accomplished.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time for which a state holds or a process is ongoing.</def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> denotes a proposition from which the main clause (headed by the target) logically follows. This often means that the <fen>Explanation</fen> causes the target's proposition, but not in all cases.</def-root>

Arg.name: Time
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> when the event occurs.
<ex>The lawyer said the woman was <t>raped</t> <fex name="Time">on a night of madness</fex> </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Instrument
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is any object used to commit the crime.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition:
<def-root>The number of times that a rape event takes place.
<ex> The eleven year old told the court that she was <t>raped</t> <fex name="Frequency">three times</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: rape.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: (of a man) force (another person) to have sexual intercourse with him against their will.

lexUnit.name: rape.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: an act or the crime of raping someone.

lexUnit.name: rapist.n
lexUnit.definition: COD: a man who commits rape.

lexUnit.name: raped.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: having been forced (by a man) to have sexual intercourse with (him)

lexUnit.name: sexually assault.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: force (another person) to have sexual intercourse with against their will.
